title: Setup complete - Beads and Serena integrated
description: Successfully initialized Beads issue tracker and Serena semantic code analysis. Updated CLAUDE.md with comprehensive workflows including TDD test-commit-revert pattern.

title: Phase 5: Implement plan caching and retrieval
description: Cache generated weekly plans in BadgerDB. Retrieve previous plans for comparison/progression. Write cache hit/miss scenario tests.

title: Phase 5: Extend database schema for user profiles
description: Store user preferences, weekly plan history in BadgerDB. Index plans by date, user goals. Write database CRUD operation tests.

title: Phase 4: Add email integration for weekly plans
description: Extend existing Mailtrap integration. Format pretty email with daily breakdown + shopping list. Write email generation and sending tests.

title: Phase 3: Create intelligent meal selection algorithm
description: Logic: Select 60-70% red meat meals, 20-30% salmon/eggs, 10% variety. Ensure each meal has protein + white rice + 2-3 low-FODMAP veggies. Write meal selection distribution tests.

title: Phase 1: Create UserProfile struct for macro calculations
description: Fields: Bodyweight float64, ActivityLevel string, Goal string, MealsPerDay int. Write tests for macro calculation (0.8-1g protein/lb, 0.3g fat/lb).

title: Phase 2: Convert compliant existing recipes
description: Modify recipes to remove/substitute garlic, onions, non-compliant ingredients. Add nutrition metadata to each recipe. Write recipe conversion validation tests.

title: Phase 2: Audit existing recipes for Vertical Diet compliance
description: Use Serena get_symbols_overview on each recipe YAML. Identify recipes with garlic, onions, beans, high-FODMAP vegetables. Write recipe compliance validator tests.

title: Phase 4: Implement strict validation rules
description: Check: No high-FODMAP foods, no seed oils, no forbidden grains. Validate red meat frequency, white rice as primary carb. Write validation rule enforcement tests.

title: Phase 1: Extend Recipe struct with nutrition metadata
description: Add fields: Macros{Protein, Fat, Carbs float64}, Servings int, Category string, FodmapLevel string, VerticalCompliant bool. Write unit tests for Recipe validation.

title: Phase 2: Create vertical-diet recipe templates
description: New files: vertical-beef.yaml, vertical-rice.yaml, vertical-breakfast.yaml, vertical-sides.yaml. Include macro data per serving, FODMAP level, preparation methods. Write YAML parsing tests for new fields.

title: Phase 3: Implement interactive user input collection
description: Create CollectUserProfile() function with prompts. Collect bodyweight, activity (sedentary/moderate/active), goal (gain/maintain/lose). Write input validation and macro calculation tests.

title: Phase 1: Create WeeklyMealPlan struct
description: Fields: Days[7]DailyPlan, TotalMacros Macros, ShoppingList []Ingredient. Write plan validation tests.

title: Phase 3: Implement macro-based portion calculator
description: Calculate portions to hit meal macro targets within 5%. Scale rice and meat quantities based on daily needs. Write portion calculation accuracy tests.

title: Phase 4: Update output formatter for weekly plans
description: Display daily macros, meal timing (3-5hr spacing), preparation order. Include shopping list organized by category. Write output format tests.

title: Phase 2: Index codebase with Serena
description: Run serena project index to enable gopls symbol navigation. Verify language server loaded and symbols indexed. BLOCKER for all other tasks.

title: Phase 3: Create weekly plan generator with progression
description: Generate 7 days of 3-4 meals each. Include variety in cuts/preparations, progressive portion increases. Write weekly macro totals validation tests.
